      • uiThreadAwareBind

        public static <T> ChangeListener<T> uiThreadAwareBind(@Nonnull
                                                      Property<T> property,
                                                      @Nonnull
                                                      ObservableValue<T> observable)
        Registers a ChangeListener on the supplied observable that will notify the target property.
        Parameters:
        property - the property that will be notified of value changes.
        observable - the observable on which the listener will be registered.
        Returns:
        the wrapped change listener.
        Since:
        2.11.0

        observable - the observable set property to wrap.
        Returns:
        an observable set property.
